description: Get ready to chuckle and be entertained with our selection of witty and clever cartoons. Each week, we showcase four new homegrown cartoons that are sure to brighten up your day from The Straits Times’ very own cartoonists.
title: Cartoons of the week
title_page: Cartoons of the week | The Straits Times
